description: This here is a ballad sung by a banjo-picking armadillo, all about its bike-riding canine friend and skunk bud. Together, they’re off on a grand trip. The Merino Wool Animal Haus sock invites you along for the ride. So, if you like to keep things light, or just light up, these everyday Merino Wool socks are guaranteed for an endless jam session.
name: Darn Tough Socks Animal Haus Crew Lightweight Socks - Mens

specs.value: No slipping, no bunching, and no blisters
Unprecedented durability and our unique “put it on, forget it’s on” feel
Pulls moisture away from skin. Fast drying
Cool in the summer, warm in the winter
